channel.title: Just so I don't forget + mod sees this
channel.description: Show new replies to your posts hasn't been working for me for the past 10minutes, I've seen replies to my threads but when I click show new replies to your posts nothing comes up literally 1 second before. Happened numerous times so it isn't a coincident. nuff saaid, close after a mod reads ty.

item.title: Just so I don't forget + mod sees this
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:15, topic:436951”][quote author=SilentCJ link=topic=539665.msg3950690#msg3950690 date=1332264852]
Never happened to me either, and I’m constantly refreshing that page

Unlikely, but is it possible someone (a mod) deleted your post in that topic, therefore it doesn’t show that it’s a topic you’ve already replied to? If you get what I mean…
[/quote]Did you just insinuate you use a auto refresher ? xD no wonder you have such high login time.[/quote]
Been here 4 years, I think mine’s fairly average Just haven’t ‘taken a break’ like most people tend to.
And no, just that I have nothing better to do with my life than keep pressing the refresh button.

Read full topic
item.source: Just so I don't forget + mod sees this

Unlikely, but is it possible someone (a mod) deleted your post in that topic, therefore it doesn’t show that it’s a topic you’ve already replied to? If you get what I mean…[/quote]Did you just insinuate you use a auto refresher ? xD no wonder you have such high login time.

item.title: Just so I don't forget + mod sees this
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“xxlukexx, post:13, topic:436951”][quote author=Kidpaparoach link=topic=539665.msg3950693#msg3950693 date=1332265326]

Never happened to me either, and I’m constantly refreshing that page

Unlikely, but is it possible someone (a mod) deleted your post in that topic, therefore it doesn’t show that it’s a topic you’ve already replied to? If you get what I mean…

Well I told you Newty somehow some of my posts are randomly getting deleted so it may be linked to that. He seemed skeptical cause he checked but I know for a fact some of my posts have been deleted…
[/quote]

Probably spam or the thread was deleted. Although, if you’ve posted on a thread that got deleted afterwards, your count stays but obviously you can’t see your posts.[/quote]
It wasn’t spam, I don’t spam:L.

Read full topic

Unlikely, but is it possible someone (a mod) deleted your post in that topic, therefore it doesn’t show that it’s a topic you’ve already replied to? If you get what I mean…
[/quote]
Well I told you Newty somehow some of my posts are randomly getting deleted so it may be linked to that. He seemed skeptical cause he checked but I know for a fact some of my posts have been deleted…[/quote]

Probably spam or the thread was deleted. Although, if you’ve posted on a thread that got deleted afterwards, your count stays but obviously you can’t see your posts.
